reviews.review_msg: I thought she was a great prof! I hardly attended lectures and yet still did well on essays. The exam was straight forward, one of the easiest exams I've ever written. Reading material was simple too, and she clarified alot of info. Overall, I would recommend!

Peter is a funny, caring prof. Lecture aren't mandatory to show up to but show up because there are performances sometimes. There's a lot of reading, and it's difficult to understand the purpose/point sometimes (go to tutorial!) Grading is fair, grading criteria is clear, overall an easy course.
Really great prof!  Has interesting lectures that really make you think!  He's kinda quirky and really funny in lectures, I recommend any English class he's teaching.

Peter was my favourite prof this term. Very organized, covered a great deal of material in the short lecture time, and the course readings were very interesting. He was also very passionate about not only the content of the course, but teaching to us. Easiness, I think, depends more on your TA.

Honestly took this class as a GPA booster, and it wasn't too bad. Very intriguing lectures, even though he posts the lecture slides he expands a lot on them. He was my tutorial leader as well. With him, and especially on the final be sure to master how to write a strong thesis, and you'll be set

I seriously recommend this class for first years or anyone looking for an easy mark! minimal reading and the papers were moderately easy and the final was matching and fill in the blank, NO ESSAY!! Diana was funny and helpful and made it easy for students to do well in the class.

Dr. Solomon is probably the best prof I had at SFU! Her lectures are interesting and don't worry if you're not into plays because she does a good job of explaining what is happening. I didn't read much plays or literature before her class but I still found the class still interesting. This class is definitely an easy A!

Lectures were boring but she is an awesome person. I skipped class and didn't read anything until a day before the final, ended up with an 80. REALLY easy final. Papers are worth half of your grade and are not marked by Diana. If you get a bad TA like I did, you're screwed. Luckily my final pulled me up. Would recommend Solomon overall

Prof is really nice but your exam and papers are marked by your TA. Overall pretty easy but if dramas aren't your thing then lectures will be boring. I did minimal studying, didn't read 2 plays and skimmed over the others and ended up with an 87 on the final.

Overall, this class was not hard, quite straightforward. Reall all the reading and understand them, and you will do well. Taking this class I realized that reading and drama isn't for me, thus I found the class to be extremely boring at time.
